page.title: 07SHEEPCOTE
page.content: Mrs.L Buckley has owned{Sheepcote}for 21 years, previously it was owned by Mrs. Barnaby. The farmhouse is approx.150 years old, but an extention was built in 1924.The house stands admist 26 acres,10 and half hectares,of which 3 acres is taken up with her{indoor {riding stables.}In her grounds there is a monument which was erected in 1906.Mrs. Buckley also owns some woodland which covers half a acre and has the oldest oak in Herefordshire which is 300 years old.Also there are Elders,Sycamore and limes in her wood. Mrs.Buckley says she likes living at Sheepcote and hopes its tradtions will be carried on by her children.
